publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5181 Tommy Sheridan: Best Wishes to Hugo Chavez—That the Parliament recognises the huge strides made by the democratically elected government of the Bolivarian Socialist Republic of Venezuela in reducing poverty, illiteracy and inequality and in tackling homelessness and poor quality housing through its socialist programmes over the years since the election of Hugo Chavez in 1998; therefore sends its best wishes to Hugo Chavez as he seeks re-election to the presidency on 3 December 2006, and believes that the United States of America must stop interfering in Venezuela’s democratic process and accept the will of the Venezuelan people to support and elect a socialist president and government.

S2M-5181 Tommy Sheridan: Best Wishes to Hugo Chavez—That the Parliament recognises the huge strides made by the democratically elected government of the Bolivarian Socialist Republic of Venezuela in reducing poverty, illiteracy and inequality and in tackling homelessness and poor quality housing through its socialist programmes over the years since the election of Hugo Chavez in 1998; therefore sends its best wishes to Hugo Chavez as he seeks re-election to the presidency on 3 December 2006, and believes that the United States of America must stop interfering in Venezuela’s democratic process and accept the will of the Venezuelan people to support and elect a socialist president and government. Supported by: Campbell Martin*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-5181 Best Wishes to Hugo Chavez (lodged on 16 November 2006) Ms Sandra White*
